typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as string,
		END_TIME as string,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> MoviesCSV
MoviesCSV aggregate(groupBy(movie),
	each(match(name!='movie'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
DistinctRows aggregate(rowcount_agg = count(1)) ~> RowCountDistinct
MoviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie = AC_RGSTRN,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> OriginalData
OriginalData aggregate(rowcount_orig = count(1)) ~> RowCountOrig
DistinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutputDistinctData
